entry.title: Explorations
entry.content:
These are just examples of how I go about doing some iterations.

 

I love distorted type so here I was trying out differently levels of distortion. I moved the sheet of polyester while it was in the middle of scanning.

 

For these two iterations, I scanned some chicken wire someone had brought it randomly. I like the caged feeling it brings to the type but it was a little too much. Messing with the color brought about different atmospheres, which is always fun to explore when working!

entry.title: Imminent Loss: Film Festival
entry.content:
Branding, Concept, Photography

A film festival that features the works of David Fincer and Steve McQueen. I was very interested in the films that these directors make because they are quite dark and twisted. The films are very complex and deal with very heavy topics. Characters in their films also have very intricate and delicate relationships with one another. While watching their films, I felt that loss was one of the main reoccuring themes of their works. 

The main motif: a moth

 

 

Ticket stubs for the festival

 

 

Eye catching banners

 

Feel free to view the process PDF for some indepth commentary.
